title: Good Day For Fascism = Good Day For Stonks!! 10.04.22

description:
In episode 1344, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Get Rich Nick, Nick Turner, to discuss… Fascism Has a Good Day In Brazil And the Market Approves, Majorly Tainted Goon is Now Just Leaning into the Paranoia, MORE OBSCURE SPORTS CHEATING and more!
